short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Play Duck Life game on GameComets. Duck Life online game. Created for Duck Life fans.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Duck Life is a charming and engaging online adventure game where players train a cute duckling to compete in races. The game begins with the selection and customization of a duck, which players can personalize in appearance and color. Players are tasked with enhancing their duck's abilities by engaging in various mini-games that focus on skills like running, swimming, flying, and climbing. Each mini-game is designed to improve specific attributes of the duck, contributing to its overall performance in the races.

The gameplay is divided into levels, each presenting new challenges and tougher competitors. As players progress, they can unlock new skills and upgrade existing ones using coins earned from races and training sessions. The ultimate goal is to develop the duck's abilities to the maximum and win the championship race. 

If you have any questions about our Duck Life game extension or just want to give us some feedback, feel free to send us a message or write a review! We'd love to hear from you. You can mouse over to Support tab on the extension, then click on "visit the developer's support site" to contact us.

If you wish to remove this extension, follow this steps:
1. Click the 3-dot icon at the top-right corner of your screen.
2. Hover your mouse on More tools then click Extensions.
3. Find the Duck Life game extension.
4. Press "Remove"
